title: Spacious renovated 2 bedroom apartment in Tacoma near JBLM
posting_body: *DISCLAIMER* PHOTOS ARE LISTED FROM A SIMILAR FLOORPLAN IN THE BUILDING
- Schedule an in person tour link: <URL>
- For questions please call or text:
- Professionally Managed by Real Property Associate
- Bright with large windows and extra storage
- Fabulous location in Tacoma, minutes from the freeway
- Quiet and private street with ample parking
- Walk to coffee shops, restaurants, shopping, express bus lines and parks
- Electricity/Water/Sewer/Garbage is separate from the rent with metered usage
- Last month's rent due at move in
- Renter's Insurance required and part of Resident Benefit Package ($19.95 monthly)
- Pet/Animal screening profile required as part of the application process ($30 each application)
